statements: SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data;
SELECT location, date, ph_level FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE ph_level > 7;
SELECT id, location, date FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE turbidity < 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE location='River A' AND dissolved_oxygen > 6 ORDER BY ph_level ASC;
SELECT id, location, turbidity FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, date, ph_level FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE ph_level > 7;
SELECT id, location, date, turbidity FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND turbidity < 2.0;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data ORDER BY date DESC, ph_level ASC;
SELECT AVG(ph_level) AS avg_ph, MAX(dissolved_oxygen) AS max_do FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE location = 'Lake A';
SELECT id, location, parameter, value, date FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT location, parameter, value, date, id FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT parameter, date, value, location, id FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT station_id, station_name, location, date_established FROM MonitoringStations
SELECT location, station_name, date_established, station_id FROM MonitoringStations
SELECT id, location, parameter, value, date FROM WaterQualityData WHERE value > 5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT parameter, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM WaterQualityData GROUP BY parameter ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE parameter='pH' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT station_id, station_name, location, date_established FROM MonitoringStations ORDER BY date_established DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, parameter, value, date FROM WaterQualityData WHERE location='River' ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data
SELECT location, timestamp FROM water_quality_monitoring_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT monitoring_id, location, water_quality_index FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE water_quality_index > 80
SELECT source_name, location, source_type FROM water_sources
SELECT * FROM water_quality_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE water_quality_index > 75;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE water_quality_index < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM water_sources WHERE location = 'River' ORDER BY source_name;

SELECT monitoring_id, location, timestamp, water_quality_index FROM water_quality_monitoring_data JOIN water_quality_analysis ON water_quality_monitoring_data.monitoring_id = water_quality_analysis.monitoring_id WHERE contamination_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE source_type = 'Well' AND location NOT LIKE '%lake%'
SELECT * FROM water_quality_site;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_site;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_site WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_parameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, unit_of_measurement FROM water_quality_parameters WHERE parameter_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_site;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_site;
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_site WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_data ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, measurement_time ASC;

SELECT site_name, parameter_name, measurement_date, measurement_value FROM water_quality_site JOIN water_quality_data ON water_quality_site.site_id = water_quality_data.site_id JOIN water_quality_parameters ON water_quality_data.parameter_id = water_quality_parameters.parameter_id;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM water_quality_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_unit FROM water_quality_parameters WHERE parameter_unit = 'ppm';
SELECT site_name, location, date_established FROM water_quality_sites WHERE location = 'River';
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_value, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 5;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM water_quality_sites WHERE location = 'River';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_unit FROM water_quality_parameters WHERE parameter_description LIKE '%bacteria%';
SELECT site_name, location, date_established FROM water_quality_sites ORDER BY date_established DESC;

SELECT wq.site_name, wp.parameter_name, wqm.measurement_value, wqm.measurement_date FROM water_quality_sites wq JOIN water_quality_measurements wqm ON wq.site_id = wqm.site_id JOIN water_quality_parameters wp ON wqm.parameter_id = wp.parameter_id WHERE wqm.measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY wqm.measurement_value DESC;
